name: The Mighty Button (Trijam 168)
description:
Welcome to The Mighty Button!

Behold the Mighty Button™, before it you must prostrate yourself!
When the city is on fire and pedestrians are running for their life, you have no choice but to borrow the button's power to extinguish fires. But do it quickly, otherwise fires will propagate and burn the city to the ground!

How to play:

  • Mouve your hand to push the (mighty) button, but be cautious to not hurt pedestrians!
  • Every time you push the button, a fire will disappear and a new button will appear.
  • New fires will start over time so act quickly!
  • You win the game when all fires are extinguished
  • You lose the game if:
    • 8 fires are on screen
    • OR you killed 3 pedestrians

Controls:

Move handMouse movementPush the (mighty) buttonMouse left click Restart gameSpace (on success or game over screens)

This game has been made in 3 hours for Trijam 168 (theme: don't hurt nobody) by Nicolas.
